column1: ipccGlos`IPCC Glossary`Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change`The IPCC Data Distribution Centre glossary was compiled from glossary entries from the following IPCC Fifth Assessment Reports: Climate Change 2013 The physical science basis (WG I)
column3: Adaptation and Vulnerability (WG II) and Climate Change 2014 Mitigation of Climate Change (WG III). Useful acronyms have also been included.`http://www.ipcc-data.org/guidelines/pages/glossary/index.html
